flare

  • Welcome to flare’s documentation!
  • Edit on GitHub

PPO agent trained to play LunarLanderContinuous-v2. Reward per episode at this point was ~230.

Welcome to flare’s documentation!¶

Flare was written to be a modular reinforcement learning library.

Find the full contents of the flare package.

flare is a small reinforcement learning library. Currently, the use case for this library is small-scale RL experimentation/research. Much of the code is refactored from and built off of SpinningUp, so massive thanks to them for writing quality, understandable, and performant code.

(old) Blog post about this repository here.
